Class Train

java.lang.Object
Train
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExpressTrain, RegionalTrain
public abstract class Train extends Object
This abstract class is responsible for creating Train object and managing transit method. ExpressTrain and RegionalTrain classes inherit from this class.

  • Method Details

    • transit

      public double transit(double revenue_mod, double cost_mod)
      This method calculates one day profit generated by single train
      Parameters:
      revenue_mod - revenue modifier (provided by user)
      cost_mod - cost modifier (provided by user)
      Returns:
      money earned (or lost) during one day
